data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Toxic Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns.

data.flavorText: It attacks people and Pokémon that cross the desert. This has only furthered its bad reputation.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

attacks.name: Scorpion Grapple
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads. If 2 or more of them are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Derail
attacks.text: Discard all Special Energy cards attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Dangerous Stinger
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It takes great pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.

data.name: Drapion V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hazardous Claws
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.name: Drapion LV.X
rules: Put this card onto your Active Drapion. Drapion LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.

abilities.name: Tri-Poison
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Poisoned. Put 3 damage counters instead of 1 on that Pokémon between turns. This power can't be used if Drapion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Sniping Tail
attacks.text: Does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Hard Press
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Toxic Strike
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It's so vicious that it's called the Sand Demon. Yet when confronted by Hippowdon, Drapion keeps a low profile and will never pick a fight.

data.name: Drapion

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It takes pride in its strength. Even though it can tear foes apart, it finishes them off with powerful poison.

data.name: Drapion V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Hazardous Claws
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned.

data.name: Drapion V
rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Wild Style
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless less for each of your opponent's Single Strike, Rapid Strike, and Fusion Strike Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Dynamic Tail
attacks.text: This attack also does 60 damage to 1 of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.name: Drapion VSTAR
rules: VSTAR rule: When your Pokémon VSTAR is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Hazard Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed and Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Big Bang Arm
attacks.text: This attack does 10 less damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

rules: V rule: When your Pokémon V is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.text: This attack also does 60 damage to 1 of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
